product_name: Contigo Ashland Chill 2.0 Stainless Steel Leak-Proof Water Bottle with Straw and Carry Handle for Easy Travel, Vacuum-Insulated and BPA-Free, Glacier, 24 oz (709 mL)
description: Push, sip, and press your way to better hydration. The Contigo AUTOSPOUT Stainless Steel Water Bottle features push-button technology for easy one-handed drinking. Whether you’re working out or working at your desk, the double-wall vacuum-insulated stainless steel body keeps drinks cold for 24 hours and hot for 6 hours. The leakproof lid means less mess wherever you go, and the spout cover helps to protect the spout from dirt and grime so you can drink confidently. Carrying it around is easy with the integrated handle that swings up and sets back down to stay out of the way. Sip every last drop with the angled pop-up straw that fits securely into the lid. The lid is top-rack dishwasher-safe for easy cleanups and the body is hand-washable. 24 oz (709mL) bottle fits most car cup holders.

latest_reviews.title: great price
latest_reviews.text: Great water bottle, keeps water cold for hours!

latest_reviews.title: Garde l'eau fraîche longtemps!
latest_reviews.text: Keeps water cold for a long time!

latest_reviews.title: Defective
latest_reviews.text: The bottle leaked after only a few uses. Very disappointed.

latest_reviews.title: Love the style, but sometimes leaks
latest_reviews.text: I love the style of this water bottle, but it leaks sometimes. It's not a major issue, but it's something to be aware of.

latest_reviews.title: Delivery on time
latest_reviews.text: The bottle arrived on time and in perfect condition. It keeps my water cold all day long.

latest_reviews.title: Great until it broke
latest_reviews.text: I loved this water bottle until the handle broke after only a few weeks of use.  I'm very disappointed with the quality.
